record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, OCTOBER 29, 2007, AT 3 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, OCTOBER 29, 2007, AT 3 P.M. -- (Senate - October 26, 2007)

[Page: S13495]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 1:47 p.m., adjourned until Monday, October 29, 2007, at 3 p.m.
